QuestData.Title: Finding Your Center
QuestData.Description: The dream brew is complete! This time, when you drink it, you must embrace the visions you see from a state of inner focus.$b$bFollow me to my pagoda, and I will teach you how to achieve the inner calm that we pandaren value so much.$b$bYour troubled mind will present you with many distractions, but just remember to stay centered!
QuestData.LogDescription: Meditate with Lorewalker Cho at the pagoda at the Dreamer's Pavilion in the Jade Forest.
QuestData.RewardText: How did you find me?$B$B<Anduin listens to you describe the vision from the Dream Brew.>$B$BRemarkable! That's exactly what happened several days ago. We've been laying low since then.
